00014 CFinaleStaticScene::CFinaleStaticScene(const std::string &game_path, const std::string &scene_file):
00015  mp_current_tb(NULL), m_mustclose(false), m_count(0)
00016 {
00017  mp_SceneSurface = SDL_CreateRGBSurface( g_pVideoDriver->getBlitSurface()->flags, 320, 200, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00018  SDL_SetColors( mp_SceneSurface, g_pGfxEngine->Palette.m_Palette, 0, 255);
00019  finale_draw( mp_SceneSurface, scene_file, game_path);
00020 
00021  SDL_BlitSurface( mp_SceneSurface, NULL, g_pVideoDriver->ScrollSurface, NULL );
00022 }
00023 
00024 void CFinaleStaticScene::push_string(const std::string &text, Uint32 delay)
00025 {
00026  CMessageBox *p_Textbox = new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString(text), true, false, true);
00027 
00028  mp_textbox_list.push_back(p_Textbox);
00029 
00030  mp_current_tb = mp_textbox_list.front();
00031 }
00032 
00033 void CFinaleStaticScene::showBitmapAt(const std::string &bitmapname, Uint16 from_count, Uint16 to_count, Uint16 x, Uint16 y)
00034 {
00035  bitmap_structure bmp_struct;
00036  bmp_struct.p_bitmap = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap(bitmapname);
00037  bmp_struct.dest_rect.x = x;
00038  bmp_struct.dest_rect.y = y;
00039  bmp_struct.dest_rect.w = bmp_struct.p_bitmap->getWidth();
00040  bmp_struct.dest_rect.h = bmp_struct.p_bitmap->getHeight();
00041  bmp_struct.from_count = from_count;
00042  bmp_struct.to_count = to_count;
00043  m_BitmapVector.push_back(bmp_struct);
00044 }
00045 
00046 void CFinaleStaticScene::process()
00047 {
00048  if( mp_textbox_list.empty() ) { m_mustclose = true; return; }
00049 
00050  mp_current_tb = mp_textbox_list.front();
00051 
00052  // If time up, or user pressed any key goto next text
00053  if( mp_current_tb->isFinished() )
00054  {
00055   delete mp_current_tb;
00056   m_count++;
00057 
00058   for( std::vector<bitmap_structure>::iterator i=m_BitmapVector.begin() ;
00059     i!=m_BitmapVector.end() ; i++ )
00060   {
00061    if( m_count == i->from_count) g_pSound->playSound(SOUND_SWITCH_TOGGLE, PLAY_NOW);
00062   }
00063 
00064   mp_textbox_list.pop_front();
00065   if(!mp_textbox_list.empty())
00066   {
00067    mp_current_tb = mp_textbox_list.front();
00068    //mp_current_tb->resetTimer();
00069   }
00070  }
00071  else
00072  {
00073   // Draw any requested Bitmap
00074   for( std::vector<bitmap_structure>::iterator i=m_BitmapVector.begin() ;
00075     i!=m_BitmapVector.end() ; i++ )
00076   {
00077    if( m_count >= i->from_count && m_count <= i->to_count ) // It is in the interval?
00078    { // show it!
00079     i->p_bitmap->draw(g_pVideoDriver->ScrollSurface, i->dest_rect.x, i->dest_rect.y);
00080    }
00081   }
00082 
00083   // Draw Frame and the text like type writing
00084   mp_current_tb->process();
00085  }
00086 }
00087 
00088 CFinaleStaticScene::~CFinaleStaticScene() {
00089  CMessageBox *p_textbox;
00090  while(!mp_textbox_list.empty())
00091  {
00092   p_textbox = &*mp_textbox_list.front();
00093   delete p_textbox;
00094   mp_textbox_list.pop_front();
00095  }
00096  SDL_FreeSurface(mp_SceneSurface);
00097 }
